scripts.start:
nodemon --watch src --watch package.json -e ts,json -q -x 'rm -fr dist && echo "
============
COMPILING...
============

" && tsc --outDir dist || return 0 && node dist/main/cli.js'
scripts.test:
nodemon --watch src --watch package.json -e ts,json -q -x 'rm -fr dist && echo "
============
COMPILING...
============

" && tsc --outDir dist || return 0 && tape "dist/tests/**/*.js"'
